title: 06/18/2021 - HOUR 1 - Luka Doncic, Zion Williamson & Aaron Rodgers
itunes:title: 06/18/2021 - HOUR 1 - Luka Doncic, Zion Williamson & Aaron Rodgers
description:
The Nets were playing tired against the Bucks in game 6 & James Harden will be better in game 7 

Colin talks about the Mavericks needing a solid number 2 option for Luka. 

Why Aaron Rodgers will never be in Tom Brady’s class. 

Don’t confuse Luka’s situation with Zion’s situation. 

Guest: FOX Sports NBA Analyst Ric Bucher 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
